feed.title: Security Advisory for Java artifacts hosted at the Maven central repository
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for Java artifacts hosted at the Maven central repository on GitHub

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal Fragment Module and Liferay DXP Vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Fragment module in Liferay Portal 7.2.1 through 7.3.4, and Liferay DXP 7.2 before fix pack 9 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _com_liferay_site_admin_web_portlet_SiteAdminPortlet_name parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33339
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17102
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747934
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7pxh-q6jw-6xj8

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.portal.bom] Liferay Portal Fragment Module and Liferay DXP Vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Fragment module in Liferay Portal 7.2.1 through 7.3.4, and Liferay DXP 7.2 before fix pack 9 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _com_liferay_site_admin_web_portlet_SiteAdminPortlet_name parameter.

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal Layout Module and Liferay DXP Exposes the Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Token in URLs
entry.content:
The Layout module in Liferay Portal 7.1.0 through 7.3.2, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 19, and 7.2 before fix pack 6, exposes the CSRF token in URLs, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain the token and conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks via the p_auth parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33338
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17030
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120748276
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4frg-rpx6-96qh

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal Journal Module and Liferay DXP Vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Journal module's add article menu in Liferay Portal 7.3.0 through 7.3.3, and Liferay DXP 7.1 fix pack 18, and 7.2 fix pack 5 through 7, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _com_liferay_journal_web_portlet_JournalPortlet_name parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33336
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17078
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/cve-2021-33336-stored-xss-with-structure-name
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fvg6-9r88-7w85

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Has Company Administrator Accounts Vulnerable to Takeovers
entry.content:
Privilege escalation vulnerability in Liferay Portal 7.0.3 through 7.3.4, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 20, and 7.2 before fix pack 9 allows remote authenticated users with permission to update/edit users to take over a company administrator user account by editing the company administrator user.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33335
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17103
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220828222916/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747906
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5gh9-g62h-f35m

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Fails to Check User Permissions for Workflow Submissions
entry.content:
The Portal Workflow module in Liferay Portal 7.3.2 and earlier, and Liferay DXP 7.0 before fix pack 93, 7.1 before fix pack 19 and 7.2 before fix pack 6, does not properly check user permission, which allows remote authenticated users to view and delete workflow submissions via crafted URLs.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33333
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17032
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747742
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-g7xc-m762-wg8f

The Portal Workflow module in Liferay Portal 7.3.2 and earlier, and Liferay DXP 7.0 before fix pack 93, 7.1 before fix pack 19 and 7.2 before fix pack 6, does not properly check user permission, which allows remote authenticated users to view and delete workflow submissions via crafted URLs.

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Portlet Configuration module in Liferay Portal 7.1.0 through 7.3.2, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 19, and 7.2 before fix pack 7, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _com_liferay_portlet_configuration_css_web_portlet_PortletConfigurationCSSPortlet_portletResource parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33332
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17053
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120748366
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9995-qvcg-x7g6

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.portal.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Don't Check Permissions of Pages
entry.content:
The Layout module in Liferay Portal 7.1.0 through 7.3.1, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 20, and 7.2 before fix pack 5, does not properly check permission of pages, which allows remote authenticated users without view permission of a page to view the page via a site's page administration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-33324
  • https://issues.liferay.com/browse/LPE-17001
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747063
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220828222955/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120747063
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-474f-cmx5-gm69

entry.title: [com.liferay.portal:release.dxp.bom] Liferay Portal and Liferay DXP Vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Asset Publisher App
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Asset module's Asset Publisher app in Liferay Portal 7.2.1 through 7.3.5, and Liferay DXP 7.1 before fix pack 21, 7.2 before fix pack 10 and 7.3 before fix pack 1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _com_liferay_asset_publisher_web_portlet_AssetPublisherPortlet_INSTANCE_XXXXXXXXXXXX_assetEntryId parameter.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-29051
  • https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743580
  • http://liferay.com
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210524223247/https://portal.liferay.dev/learn/security/known-vulnerabilities/-/asset_publisher/HbL5mxmVrnXW/content/id/120743580
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jvvx-8g42-9559
